channel.title: Error help please
channel.description:
OK im working on make a classic server and i have everything running all right and installed right and variables added, but when u run the "run_server.bat" it is supposed to connect to the "ls_server.bat" but of course i have to run that too, except "run_server.bat" works but when i rune "ls_server.bat" i get this error.
[img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/3997/lsservererror.jpg[/img]

item.title: Error help please
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

OK im working on make a classic server and i have everything running all right and installed right and variables added, but when u run the “run_server.bat” it is supposed to connect to the “ls_server.bat” but of course i have to run that too, except “run_server.bat” works but when i rune “ls_server.bat” i get this error.
